# 2001 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 2001 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 2002 for the 2001 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 2001 are as follows.
